<ce:section-title>Synthesis of [Yb (C<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>] <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>
</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">Compound <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> was prepared by hydrothermal reaction. A mixture of (CH<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>COO)<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>Yb·4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.25<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 0.076<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g), 3-methylbenzoic acid (0.25<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 0.045<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g), 4,4′-bipy (0.05<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g), absolute ethanol (1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL), H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (4<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) and pH 4 were sealed into a bomb equipped with a teflon liner, heated at 150<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 2d and then cooled to room temperature at 24<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>h. Very longer colorless needle crystals for 1 were obtained. IR data (KBr pellet, <ce:italic>υ</ce:italic> [cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>]): 3449, 2922, 1732, 1636, 1595, 1527, 1487, 1408, 1287, 1226, 1165, 1084, 807, 785, 756, 669, 578, 517, 490, 438.</ce:para><ce:section-title>Synthesis of [Eu (C<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>·(4,4′-bipy)<ce:inf loc="post">0.5</ce:inf>] <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> and [Gd (C<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>·(4,4′-bipy)<ce:inf loc="post">0.5</ce:inf>] <ce:bold>3</ce:bold>
</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">Compound <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> was prepared by hydrothermal reaction. A mixture of Eu(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>·5H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.25<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 0.107<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g), 3-methylbenzoic acid (0.25<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 0.045<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g), 4,4′-bipyridine (0.05<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g), absolute ethanol (1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL), H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (4<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) and pH 4 was sealed into a bomb equipped with a teflon liner, heated at 150<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 2d, and then cooled to room temperature at 24<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>h. The synthesis of <ce:bold>3</ce:bold> is similar to <ce:bold>2</ce:bold>, only the Eu(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>·5H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O was replaced by the Gd(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>·5H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O. Light yellow needle crystals for <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> were obtained IR data (KBr pellet, <ce:italic>υ</ce:italic> [cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>]): 3059, 2920, 1596, 1530, 1487, 1408, 1286, 1226, 1086, 1068, 1042, 999, 911, 804, 758, 685, 676, 616, 570, 516, 489, 421.</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis of [Yb (C8H7O2)3] 1 

Compound 1 was prepared by hydrothermal reaction. A mixture of (CH3COO)3Yb⋅4H2O (0.25mmol, 0.076g), 3-methylbenzoic acid (0.25mmol, 0.045g), 4,4'-bipy (0.05g), absolute ethanol (1mL), H2O (4mL) and pH 4 were sealed into a bomb equipped with a teflon liner, heated at 150°C for 2d and then cooled to room temperature at 24h. Very longer colorless needle crystals for 1 were obtained. IR data (KBr pellet, υ [cm-1]): 3449, 2922, 1732, 1636, 1595, 1527, 1487, 1408, 1287, 1226, 1165, 1084, 807, 785, 756, 669, 578, 517, 490, 438.

Synthesis of [Eu (C8H7O2)3⋅(4,4'-bipy)0.5] 2 and [Gd (C8H7O2)3⋅(4,4'-bipy)0.5] 3 

Compound 2 was prepared by hydrothermal reaction. A mixture of Eu(NO3)3⋅5H2O (0.25mmol, 0.107g), 3-methylbenzoic acid (0.25mmol, 0.045g), 4,4'-bipyridine (0.05g), absolute ethanol (1mL), H2O (4mL) and pH 4 was sealed into a bomb equipped with a teflon liner, heated at 150°C for 2d, and then cooled to room temperature at 24h. The synthesis of 3 is similar to 2, only the Eu(NO3)3⋅5H2O was replaced by the Gd(NO3)3⋅5H2O. Light yellow needle crystals for 2 were obtained IR data (KBr pellet, υ [cm-1]): 3059, 2920, 1596, 1530, 1487, 1408, 1286, 1226, 1086, 1068, 1042, 999, 911, 804, 758, 685, 676, 616, 570, 516, 489, 421.
